ygData.subject: SV: Rubicite replacement armor
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve been talking with a GM on my server and he thinks it s hilarious that paladins have to work so outrageously hard for our armor compared to the other
ygData.messageBody:
I've been talking with a GM on my server and he thinks it's hilarious that paladins have to work so outrageously hard for our armor compared to the other classes.. First we need to get warmly with about 7 different factions, then do the quests for the molds, then go out and find that special metal, then become master smiths(I have had it confirmed from guides that you have to be a master smith)..

But the GM I spoke with said they are pushing Verant to make the quests easier..

- Avron -


----- Original Message -----
From: Dark <dark@...>
To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 4:38 AM
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Rubicite replacement armor


> From: "Dark" <dark@...>
>
> Oh it's definitly it. It looks like a PLatinum Bar in fact I was shocked
> after I killed a MB Clockwork which are pretty rare in themselves I looted
> it and saw this. UNfortunatly I let it stay on the corpse but my partner
> looted it he destroyed it later because he ran out of space in backpacks but
> he did tell me that it was not no drop.
>
> Again I am 100% positive that this was melatite.
>
> Kananek
>
